page.title: 04THE MAIN ROAD
page.content: The main A.20 from London runs through our block.The{M.20}is not scheduled to be opened until the early 1990's when it will pass through the southern part of our block. Numerous accidents have happened near our village.Since 1979 there have been 1 fatal,10 serious,and 19 slight accidents.There are 0.58 accidents per million vehicles a kilometre.The expected rural"A" road rate for accidents is 0.49 per million Vkm. The combined accident rate is higher than the expected rate, but as over half the accidents happened at junctions, the 'link_only' accident rate would be lower than expected. On a one hour traffic count there were 1089 cars, lorries and vans. Most of the villagers are eagerly waiting for the new{M20}motor way to by-pass Lenham and relieve the A20.
